options.content:
# IoT Final Project - Hydroponic crop

> Source code: https://github.com/gnaguerrer/server-hydroponic

```
git clone https://github.com/gnaguerrer/server-hydroponic
cd server-hydroponic
docker compose build
docker compose up -d
```
Las alertas SMS se envian si se supera cualquier umbral más de tres veces.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "rabbit")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alert")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alert_value")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Predicción de temperatura promedio del dia siguiente

targets.query:
from(bucket: "rabbit")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurements")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperatura_Tanque_Principal")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "rabbit")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurements")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperatura_Tanque_de_reserva")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "rabbit")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counts"] == "counts_min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "COUNT_MIN_TEMP_MAIN_TANK")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "rabbit")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counts"] == "counts_min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "COUNT_MIN_TEM_TANK")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Veces por debajo del límite inf.
